full_summary:
# Government of Canada Announces Tender Opportunity for Renovations at Charlottetown Building

## Background
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit tenders for the renovation of a Government of Canada building in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island. The successful contractor will be responsible for completing the work by March 31, 2024.

## Key Information

### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: M4000-3-0733_A
* Publication Date: May 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 23, 2023 (13:00:00 hours)
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 12, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

### Procurement Method

The procurement process involves a two-phase selection process. Responding bidders will submit a bid in two phases. For further information, please refer to the attached Invitation to Tender document.

### Security Requirements

The successful bidder's personnel, as well as any subcontractor and its personnel, must meet the mandatory security requirements outlined in the attached Invitation to Tender document.

### Selection Criteria

The selection process will be based on the following criteria:

* Phase One Qualifications: a pass or fail basis
* Phase Two Price: evaluated against the Phase Two mandatory requirements

### Requirements for Bidding

To be considered for award, tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. Bidders must regularly consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

### Language of Communication

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Key Contacts

For any inquiries or clarifications, contact Sandra Bremner at (902) 717-5395 or by email at [sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).

## Attachments

The Invitation to Tender document and supporting documents are available for download at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5243/m4000-3-0733_a_en_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5243/m4000-3-0733_a_fr_0.pdf
